messages.message:
Hey Team, we have some POC code for the new agents app but we think that the design is good enough to move to master. The code is still rough and we are trying to get it to be aligned with code in master but the problem is how do we start merging this code to master since the code changes are pretty big now. Can someone suggest a plan/process for that? Do we just dump it as single PR for merging?
cc: @Veera
i'd recommend breaking down the code into a sequence of PRs to be easier to review!
